han wav format.

ou are using doesnt have that output. Most do like audacity, goldwav etc. Y=
ou just save as mp3 or whatever instead of wav. If you still have trouble h=
eres one thats free to convert.

nline file conversion tool thats free to use (works for text, movies, sound=
